content: chain 50 3-double_crochet groups round 18 chain 4 skip the first chain-3 double_crochet group * 3 double_crochet into the next stitch between two groups repeat from * around 2 double_crochet in same space as beginning chain to complete final 50-double_crochet group slip_stitch into 3rd loop of chain round 19 chain 4 becomes first double_crochet of 3-double_crochet group 2 double_crochet in next stitch * skip 2 st 3 double_crochet in next st space between next two groups repeat from * around slip_stitch into 3rd loop of beginning chain rnds 20- 52 alternate and repeat rnds 14-16 and rnds 17-19 ending with round 16 these rounds may be repeated in any number to achieve the size bag wanted if different round 53-57 single_crochet around slip_stitch to end piece straps make 2 hook size f chain 6 leaving a long tail to attach to bag row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each of remaining 4 single_crochet turn row 2 116 chain 1 single_crochet in each of 5 st do not fasten_off single_crochet in each stitch around outsides of strap single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in each corner fasten_off leaving a long tail to attach to bag position straps 3-1/4 from outside edge of bag attach using tails i sewed with regular sewing thread first and then used tails to finish © october 9 2008
